articles.title: UK Proposes Lowering Voting Age to 16 to Boost Participation
articles.description: The United Kingdom has proposed lowering the voting age to 16 for all elections, aiming to increase voter turnout and standardize voting rights across the nation.

articles.title: Amazon Web Services Cuts Hundreds of Jobs Amid AI Adoption
articles.description: Amazon's cloud computing division, AWS, has laid off hundreds of employees as the company shifts focus towards generative AI tools, following similar moves by other tech giants.

articles.title: Trump Signs Bill Imposing Harsh Penalties for Fentanyl Dealers
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has signed bipartisan legislation permanently classifying fentanyl-like substances among the most dangerous drugs, increasing punishments for traffickers to combat the opioid epidemic.
